entries.title: Shore Up the Social Safety Net With 'Predistribution'
entries.description: Such policies include raising the minimum wage, encouraging unions and fighting monopsony.

entries.title: Notable & Quotable: Mitch McConnell on Supreme Court Ethics
entries.description: ‘Recusal is a judicial act. These senators are telling the chief justice, privately, to change the course of pending litigation.’

entries.title: Dewey Defeats Biden
entries.description: Under the theory behind Alvin Bragg’s Trump verdict, FDR could have been tried for concealing his polio.

entries.title: Don't Panic Over Artificial-Intelligence Publicity Violations
entries.description: We already have legal tools to stop abuses of your name, image, likeness and voice.

entries.title: 'Bad Boys: Ride or Die' Review: Will Smith's Series Stumbles On
entries.description: The actor returns alongside Martin Lawrence in the fourth installment of the bombastic buddy-cop franchise.

entries.title: Keith Gill's GameStop Trades Pose Conundrum for Market Cops
entries.description: Lawyers say it is unlikely regulators could bring a case against the meme-stock influencer based on the facts currently known about his trading.

entries.title: Tech Pullback Weighs on S&P 500 Ahead of Jobs Data
entries.description: Declines in Nvidia, Apple help offset gains in other Wall Street stocks, as J.M. Smucker saw its shares rise.

entries.title: Air-Traffic Controller, Southwest Pilots Faulted in Near Accident at Texas Airport
entries.description: Better training and airport technology are critical to ensuring passenger safety, the National Transportation Safety Board says.

entries.title: FTC Opens Antitrust Probe of Microsoft AI Deal
entries.description: The commission has sent subpoenas to the tech giant and an AI startup, asking whether their partnership evaded a government review.

entries.title: Europe's Ascendant Right-Wing Parties Want to Remake the EU. They Can't Agree on How.
entries.description: Nationalist parties foresee strong results in EU elections this week but divisions over Ukraine, migration and history could blunt their impact.

entries.title: Steve Bannon Ordered to Report to Prison on Contempt of Congress Conviction
entries.description: The former Trump adviser was convicted in 2022 for defying the House committee that investigated the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol attack.

entries.title: StilettosAre a Gen Z Obsession. Baby Boomers Approve.
entries.description: Stilettos are the rare fashion choice uniting 20-something and 50-something women.

entries.title: John Wilmerding (1938-2024)
entries.description: A selection of Masterpiece columns by the eminent art historian and Journal contributor, who died this week.

entries.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Slip From Records; Nvidia Retreats
entries.description: The S&P 500 slipped from its record, breaking a streak of four straight winning sessions. The Nasdaq also retreated from its all-time high reached a day earlier. The Dow climbed.
